section1.title: 1. Personal Information We Collect
section1.content: Moment Snap collects the following personal information to provide services.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Collection and Use
items1: Name, Email, Phone Number (for inquiry response and service provision)

section3.title: 3. Retention and Use Period
section3.content: Collected personal information is retained and used for the following periods:
items: Until member withdrawal
3 years after service completion (transaction records per e-commerce law)
Period specified by law if required by legislation

section4.title: 4. Third Party Provision
section4.content: Moment Snap does not provide personal information to external parties in principle. However, it may be provided when required by law or with customer consent.

section5.title: 5. User Rights
section5.content: Users can exercise the following rights at any time:
items: Request to view personal information
Request to correct or delete personal information
Request to stop processing personal information
Member withdrawal (account deletion)

section6.title: 6. Privacy Officer
section6.content: Please contact us below for privacy-related inquiries and rights exercise.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: These terms specify the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the company and users regarding the use of photography services provided by Moment Snap (hereinafter 'Company').

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.content: The definitions of terms used in these terms are as follows:
items: Service: All services provided by the company including photography, editing, and delivery
User: A customer who agrees to these terms and uses the company's services
Member: A user who has provided personal information and registered as a member
Content: All materials including photos, videos, and text provided within the service

section3.title: 3. Service Use
section3.content: The company provides the following services:
items: Various photography services including weddings, couples, families, and profiles
Photo editing and post-production
Photo delivery through online gallery
Other photography-related additional services

section4.title: 4. Contract Formation
section4.content: Photography contracts are established through the following procedures:
items: User's consultation request and photography inquiry
Company's quote provision and schedule coordination
User's contract agreement and deposit payment
Company's contract confirmation notification

section5.title: 5. Refund and Cancellation
section5.content: Shooting cancellations and refunds are applied differently depending on the cancellation time. Full refund for cancellations 14 days before shooting, 50% refund for 7 days before, non-refundable for within 3 days. However, in cases of force majeure such as natural disasters, schedule changes or refunds are possible after consultation.

section6.title: 6. Copyright and Portrait Rights
section6.content: Rights to photographed photos are divided as follows:
items: Copyright: Copyright of photographed photos belongs to the company
Usage Rights: Users can freely use photos for personal purposes
Portrait Rights: The company obtains prior consent before using user photos in portfolios
Commercial Use: Commercial use of photos requires separate consultation with the company

section7.title: 7. Disclaimer
section7.content: The company is not responsible for inability to provide services due to natural disasters or force majeure. Also, the company is not responsible for problems caused by inaccurate information provided by users.
